page.title: 05HOW WE LIVE
page.content:
Households were asked the number of people in their house: 3 with 2 members 18 with 3 members 43with 4 members 25 with 5 members 6 with 6 members 3 with 7 members 1 with 8 members. Of 442 questioned 87 were born outside the Maryport area.Only 7 were born in South of England. Of those who work or go to school: 46 bus 6 train 76 car 4 cycle 61 walk 1 jogs
Out of 100 households 58 go to the County Library regularly while 42 said they did not.45 buy at least a book a month ,while 55 said they did not.
Out of 100 households 53 go to puds or clubs every week;29 once a month,27 never go.
